tuv.seg: Ireland's Leaving Certificate Vocational Programme is a Leaving Certificate with a strong vocational aspect
Séard atá i nGairmchlár na hArdteistiméireachta ná Ardteistiméireacht le dreach láidir ghairmiúil
The programme consists of Leaving Certificate subjects, together with three compulsory link modules on enterprise education, preparation for work and work experience
Tá ábhair na hArdteistiméireachta sa chlár, in éineacht le trí mhódúil nascaithe éigeantach, ar Oideachas Fiontair, Ullmhú Oibre agus Taithí Oibre
Students must take at least 5 Leaving Certificate subjects, one of which must be Irish and a continental language or vocational language module
Caithfidh scoláirí 5 ábhar Ard-Teiste a bheith acu ar a laghad, Gaeilge a bheith mar cheann acu agus teanga iasachta nó módúl de theanga ghairmiúil
The link modules are activity-based
Tá na módúil nascaithe bunaithe ar ghníomhaíocht
They usually take a total of 2 to 3 class periods per week, compared with a Leaving Certificate subject, which generally takes 4 to 5 class periods in a week
Is iondúil go dtógann siad 2 nó 3 ranganna gach seachtain, i gcomparáid le ábhar Ardteistiméireachta a thógann 4 go 5 de ranganna sa tseachtain
The subject groupings put regular Leaving Certificate subjects that complement each other into groupings
Cuirtear gnáth-ábhair na hArdteistiméireachta a oireann dá chéile i ngrúpaí
There are 2 groupings:
Tá dhá ghrúpa ann:
• Specialist groupings, in which the subject content of each subject is helpful to the other,
• Grúpa speisialta, ina bhfuil eolas faoi ábhar amháin ag cabhrú leis an gceann eile,
• Services groupings, where the subjects might work well together from a business or commercial point of view
• Grúpa seirbhísí, ina n-oibríonn na hábhair go maith le chéile ó thaobh gnó nó tradáil de, b'fhéidir
Students must take 2 subjects from these groupings
Caithfidh scoláirí dhá ábhar a dhéanamh as an dá ghrúpa
The Leaving Certificate subjects are examined through the standard Leaving Certificate examination
Scrúdaítear na hábhair trí ghnáth-scrúdú na hArdteistiméireachta
The link modules are assessed in a written examination representing 40% of total marks and a portfolio of coursework representing 60% of total marks
Meastar na módúil nascaithe trí scrúdú scríofa a léiríonn 40% de na marcanna iomlána agus cuntas ar chúrsa oibre a léiríonn 60% de na marcanna iomlána

Students receive the same certificate as other Leaving Certificate students, but their Leaving Certificate includes an additional statement of the results of the link modules (pass, merit or distinction)
Fáigheann scoláirí an teastas céanna is a fháigheann scoláirí na hArdteistiméireachta, ach bíonn ráiteas eile sa Teastas faoi thoradh na módúil nascaithe (Pas, Fiúntas nó Gradam)
Access to further study with the Leaving Certificate Vocational Programme
Slí chuig staidéar níos airde le Gairmchlár na hArdteistiméireachta
The programme gives students the same opportunity to proceed to universities and colleges as the students taking the Established Leaving Certificate
Tugann an clár an deis chéanna do mhic léinn dul go dtí ollscoilanna agus coláistí agus a dhéanann an Ardteistiméireacht Bhunaithe
There is a new grading scheme for the Leaving Certificate in 2017
Tá scéim grádaithe nua don Ardteist i 2017
The new scheme means that the Common Points Scale used by the CAO to determine entry into higher education institutions, has also been revised
Ciallaíonn an scéim nua go ndearnadh leasú ar an Scála Pointí Comónta a úsáideann an CAO chun iontráil ar institiúidí tríú leibhéil a mheas
From 2017, Institutes of Technology and the universities recognise the link modules as follows:
Ó 2017, aithníonn na hInstitiúidí Teicneolaíochta agus na hollscoileanna na modúil naisc mar seo a leanas:
You can read more on transition.ie
Is féidir a thuilleadh a léamh anseo transition.ie
The fee for entry for school-based students of the Leaving Certificate Vocational Programme for 2017 is €116
Is é €116 an táille iontrála don bhliain 2017 do mhic léinn scoile de chuid Ghairmchlár na hArdteistiméireachta
You can get further information on state examination fees
Tá tuilleadh eolais faoi tháillí scrúduithe Stáit ar fáil anseo
Candidates who hold a current medical card or who are dependent on a parent or guardian who holds a current medical card are exempt from paying examination fees
Tá iarrthóirí a bhfuil cárta leighis reatha acu nó gur chleithiúnaithe iad de chuid tuismitheora nó caomhnóra a bhfuil cárta leighis reatha aige nó aici díolmhaithe ó tháillí scrúduithe a íoc
Applicants who are claiming exemption from fees on this basis must provide medical card details to the Commission
Ní foláir d’iarratasóirí a bhfuil díolúine ó tháillí á héileamh acu ar an mbonn sin sonraí maidir leis an gcárta leighis a sholáthar don Choimisiún
Applications from external candidates received after 8 February 2017 are subject to late fees even if the initial fee has been waived
Tá iarratais ó iarrthóirí seachtracha a fhaightear tar éis 8 Feabhra 2017 faoi réir táillí deireanacha a íoc fiú má rinneadh an táille thosaigh a tharscaoileadh
If you are a post-primary school student, your details will be sent to the State Examinations Commission by your school
Más scoláire thú atá ar freastal ar scoil dara leibhéil, cuirfidh an scoil do chuid sonraí chuig Coimisiún na Scrúduithe Stáit
If you are an external (non-school) candidate for the Leaving Certificate Vocational Programme, you can apply online or on the application form available from the State Examinations Commission

Más iarrthóir seachtrach thú (nach bhfuil ag freastal ar scoil) don Chúrsa Gairmiúil Ardteistiméireachta, ba chóir d’iarratas ar líne nó i scríbhinn dhéanamh agus a bheith curtha chuig Coimisiún na Scrúduithe Stáit faoin dáta deiridh
You can find the timetable for the practical portion of the Leaving Certificate Vocational Programme here (pdf)
Tá Clár Gairme na hArdteistiméireachta, Sceideal Dátaí Scrúduithe (pdf) le feiceáil
